actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Deacon Jacob Estey National Monument.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the site of Jacob Estey Hall, on the campus of Shaw University, Raleigh, North Carolina, for the purpose of creating the Jacob Estey National Monument.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Deacon Jacob Estey National Monument.
